At @AQPulse, we watch this closely.
Breadth tells us if the rally is built on solid ground or just hype in a handful of names.
🔍 Our tools track:
• $RSP vs $SPX
• % of stocks above 50/200 MA
• Advance-decline trends
• Sector breadth

⚠️ This is called a breadth divergence when most stocks aren’t following the leaders.
Historically, this signaled trouble ahead:
• 1972
• 1990
• 2000
But not always.
In 2014 and 2017, the market shook it off.
